location.zh-cn: 美国新泽西州普林斯顿市

description.zh-cn: 世界著名的私立研究型大学，美国四大学府之一和常春藤盟校成员。前身为1746年成立的纽泽西学院，1896年正式更名为普林斯顿大学。
description.en: A world-renowned private research university, one of the Big Three universities in the United States and a member of the Ivy League. Formerly the College of New Jersey, founded in 1746, it was officially renamed Princeton University in 1896.

description.zh-cn: 普林斯顿大学的前身，1746年由长老会创立，1896年正式更名为普林斯顿大学。
description.en: The predecessor of Princeton University, founded by Presbyterians in 1746 and officially renamed Princeton University in 1896.

description.zh-cn: 一场基督教复兴运动，推动了普林斯顿大学等高等教育机构的建立。
description.en: A Christian revival movement that spurred the establishment of institutions of higher education, including Princeton University.

description.zh-cn: 基督新教的一个宗派，创立了普林斯顿大学的前身纽泽西学院，最初目的是培养长老。
description.en: A Protestant denomination that founded the College of New Jersey, the predecessor to Princeton University, initially to train ministers.

description.zh-cn: 美国第28任总统，曾任普林斯顿大学校长及新泽西州州长。在担任校长期间，引入了“precept”小组导修课制度，对普林斯顿乃至美国高等教育产生了深远影响。
description.en: The 28th President of the United States, former President of Princeton University, and Governor of New Jersey. During his tenure as university president, he introduced the preceptorial system, which had a profound impact on Princeton and American higher education.

description.zh-cn: 香港商人，合和实业创办人及董事局主席，普林斯顿大学校友。1995年向普林斯顿大学捐款一亿美元。
description.en: Hong Kong businessman, founder and chairman of Hopewell Holdings, and an alumnus of Princeton University. He donated $100 million to Princeton University in 1995.

description.zh-cn: 美国数学家，普林斯顿大学博士，诺贝尔经济学奖得主。主要工作领域为博弈论和微分几何学，提出了纳什均衡理论。
description.en: American mathematician, Princeton Ph.D., and Nobel laureate in Economics. His main areas of work were game theory and differential geometry, and he proposed the Nash equilibrium concept.

description.zh-cn: 美国企业家，亚马逊公司创始人，普林斯顿大学校友。
description.en: American entrepreneur, founder of Amazon.com, and an alumnus of Princeton University.

description.zh-cn: 由美国东北部地区的八所私立大学组成的体育赛事联盟，后引申为顶尖名校的代称。
description.en: An athletic conference composed of eight private universities in the Northeastern United States, now commonly used to refer to a group of elite universities.

description.zh-cn: 于1812年从普林斯顿大学分离出来的神学院，因长老会希望有更多的神学培训，而当时大学的师生则希望减少神学色彩。
description.en: A theological seminary that separated from Princeton University in 1812 because Presbyterians desired more theological training, while the university's faculty and students wished to reduce its theological focus.

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在中国的一系列学生领导的民主运动，事件后普林斯顿大学东亚研究系成立了普林斯顿中国学社。
description.en: A series of student-led pro-democracy protests in China in 1989. After the event, Princeton's Department of East Asian Studies established the Princeton China Initiative.

description.zh-cn: 由普林斯顿大学东亚研究系在六四事件后成立，旨在收留流亡海外的中国学生和学者。
description.en: An organization founded by Princeton University's Department of East Asian Studies after the Tiananmen Square protests to support exiled Chinese students and scholars.

nodes.id: 普林斯顿大学东亚研究系

zh-cn: 普林斯顿大学东亚研究系
en: Department of East Asian Studies, Princeton University

description.zh-cn: 普林斯顿大学下属的学术部门，在创系元老牟复礼的经营下成为世界级的中国研究重镇。
description.en: An academic department within Princeton University that, under the leadership of its founding father Frederick W. Mote, became a world-class center for Chinese studies.

description.zh-cn: 美国汉学家，普林斯顿大学东亚研究系的创系元老，专长为元明史。
description.en: American sinologist and a founding father of the Department of East Asian Studies at Princeton University, specializing in Yuan and Ming history.

nodes.id: 克里斯托弗·埃斯格鲁伯

zh-cn: 克里斯托弗·埃斯格鲁伯

description.zh-cn: 美国法学家，普林斯顿大学现任校长。
description.en: American legal scholar and the current President of Princeton University.

description.zh-cn: 英国数学家、计算机科学家、密码学家，被誉为“计算机科学与人工智能之父”。1938年在普林斯顿大学获得博士学位。
description.en: British mathematician, computer scientist, and cryptanalyst, hailed as the father of computer science and artificial intelligence. He received his Ph.D. from Princeton University in 1938.

description.zh-cn: 德裔理论物理学家，创立了相对论。他长期任职于普林斯顿高等研究院，与普林斯顿大学关系密切。
description.en: German-born theoretical physicist who developed the theory of relativity. He had a long tenure at the Institute for Advanced Study in Princeton, which is closely associated with Princeton University.

location.zh-cn: 美国新泽西州普林斯顿

description.zh-cn: 位于普林斯顿的独立研究机构，与普林斯顿大学关系密切，但行政上相互独立。
description.en: An independent research institution located in Princeton, closely associated with Princeton University but administratively separate.

description.zh-cn: 美国跨国科技公司，由普林斯顿校友杰夫·贝佐斯创立。
description.en: An American multinational technology company founded by Princeton alumnus Jeff Bezos.

description.zh-cn: 第一次大觉醒运动的曙光长老会创立了纽泽西学院，旨在培养长老。
description.en: The New Light Presbyterians of the First Great Awakening founded the College of New Jersey to train ministers.

description.zh-cn: 曙光长老会于1746年创立了纽泽西学院。
description.en: The New Light Presbyterians founded the College of New Jersey in 1746.

description.zh-cn: 1896年，为了表示对所在地的尊敬，新泽西学院正式改名为普林斯顿大学。
description.en: In 1896, the College of New Jersey was officially renamed Princeton University to honor its location.

description.zh-cn: 普林斯顿大学是常春藤盟校的成员之一。
description.en: Princeton University is a member of the Ivy League.

description.zh-cn: 由于普林斯顿大学的师生希望减少学校的神学色彩，而长老们希望加强神学培训，导致普林斯顿神学院于1812年从大学分离。
description.en: Princeton Theological Seminary separated from the university in 1812 due to differing views on theological education between the university's faculty/students and the Presbyterian elders.

description.zh-cn: 伍德罗·威尔逊于1902年担任普林斯顿大学校长。
description.en: Woodrow Wilson served as the President of Princeton University starting in 1902.

description.zh-cn: 伍德罗·威尔逊是普林斯顿大学1879届校友。
description.en: Woodrow Wilson was an alumnus of the Princeton Class of 1879.

description.zh-cn: 担任校长期间，引入了称为“precept”的小组导修课，对普林斯顿大学的本科教育模式进行了重要革新。
description.en: During his presidency, he introduced the preceptorial system, a significant innovation in Princeton's undergraduate educational model.

description.zh-cn: 于1995年向母校普林斯顿大学捐款一亿美元。
description.en: Donated $100 million to his alma mater, Princeton University, in 1995.

description.zh-cn: 杰夫·贝佐斯是亚马逊公司的创始人。
description.en: Jeff Bezos is the founder of Amazon.com.

description.zh-cn: 普林斯顿大学与临近的普林斯顿高等研究院关系密切。
description.en: Princeton University has a close relationship with the nearby Institute for Advanced Study.

relationships.source: 普林斯顿大学东亚研究系

description.zh-cn: 普林斯顿大学东亚研究系在六四事件后成立了普林斯顿中国学社。
description.en: The Department of East Asian Studies at Princeton University founded the Princeton China Initiative after the Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 普林斯顿中国学社是在六四事件之后成立的，旨在收留流亡的中国学生和学者。
description.en: The Princeton China Initiative was established in the aftermath of the Tiananmen Square protests to support exiled Chinese students and scholars.

relationships.target: 普林斯顿大学东亚研究系

description.zh-cn: 作为创系元老，牟复礼的经营使得普林斯顿大学东亚研究系在20世纪70年代迅速崛起，成为中国研究重镇。
description.en: As a founding father, Frederick W. Mote's leadership led to the rapid rise of the Department of East Asian Studies at Princeton University in the 1970s, establishing it as a major center for Chinese studies.

relationships.source: 克里斯托弗·埃斯格鲁伯

description.zh-cn: 克里斯托弗·埃斯格鲁伯是普林斯顿大学的现任校长。
description.en: Christopher L. Eisgruber is the current President of Princeton University.

description.zh-cn: 艾伦·图灵于1938年获得普林斯顿大学博士学位。
description.en: Alan Turing received his Ph.D. from Princeton University in 1938.

description.zh-cn: 爱因斯坦长期任职于与普林斯顿大学关系密切的普林斯顿高等研究院，使得普林斯顿大学在流行文化中常与他联系在一起。
description.en: Einstein had a long tenure at the Institute for Advanced Study, which is closely associated with Princeton University, leading to a strong connection in popular culture.
